ygData.subject: Re: Pottery?? The unknown art form, hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: Any Idea which vendor?  Currently vials are a much sought after item for all Shaman. Talorc Shaman of Justice ... From: Stephen Reinsborough
ygData.messageBody:
Any Idea which vendor? Currently vials are a much sought after item for all
Shaman.


Talorc
Shaman of Justice
